price: ¡Oh, creyentes! Si se someten a algunos de la Gente del Libro, ellos lograrán sacarlos a ustedes de la fe a la incredulidad.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن تُطِيعُواْ فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ يَرُدُّوكُم بَعۡدَ إِيمَٰنِكُمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū in tuṭīʿū farīqan mina alladhīna ūtū al-kitāba yaruddūkum baʿda īmānikum kāfirīna
